Posts.Content: Hi all I have BC spread to bones as of 2006. This is my 1st winter out of the hospital with the mets. It has been very cold here and my femurs and arms and shoulders have been aching just like back in 2006 when 1st diagnosed. I am curious if anyone else has this horrifying pain due to bone mets,,,,,I am 41 I take Zometa monthly.I really dont think arthritis hurts this badly. Please let me know   Mindi
Posts.Title: Bone Pain

Posts.Content: Hey I have that too from Taxol and Taxotere,,,,,,,,,,,,I take Xanax for Panic attacks BUT it seems to help the nerves that are damaged or whatever from the chemo,,,,,,,,,,it is worth a try     Mindi
Posts.Title: after effec t

Posts.Content: Hi I am wondering what side effects anyone else has experienced from Zometa. So far it has affected my eyesight to the point I cannot drive. It has done marveks for my bone mets but the trade off for the eyes really sucks. I am 40 and in Seattle. Please let me know.   Mindi
Posts.Title: Zometa

Posts.Content: Hi I am 40 years old BC stage 2 in 2001,,,,,,,,,,,Bone mets in 2006.................tumor markers elevated today at appt...CA-125,CEA and something else,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,can this be ANYTHING else but cancer? I am soooooooooo scared and have no new symptoms   Mindi
Posts.Title: Tumor marker elevation
